radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple nodules throughout the lungs, abscesses in the spleen, and lytic lesions in the right occiput, right ilium, and distal right femur.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: All evidence of infection resolved over the next several months.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Lytic lesions in the distal right ulna and radius, right index finger, left distal femur, and proximal tibia, with diffuse sclerosis of the L5 vertebral body.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent culture from the lytic lesions grew Battey-type mycobacteria.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Destructive lesions in the right ulna, the distal femurs, the proximal and distal tibia, and the frontal bone of the skull.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Recurrence of symptoms throughout his life after withdrawal of streptomycin therapy.
